analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x53f32fe62e432a43a61dfd0e23f4991d0f4bba0a.sol:
	Contract ERC20Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x53f32fe62e432a43a61dfd0e23f4991d0f4bba0a.sol#377-379)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x53f32fe62e432a43a61dfd0e23f4991d0f4bba0a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/26/0x53f32fe62e432a43a61dfd0e23f4991d0f4bba0a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0x53f32fe62e432a43a61dfd0e23f4991d0f4bba0a.sol#137) is not in mixedCase
